data.title: Celebs from the North East that make us proud to call them our own
data.meta_description: Celebrities who were born in the North East of England, in places like Newcastle, Sunderland, Middlesbrough, Durham and South Shields, that make us proud.
data.text:
Ridley Scott

Ridley Scott, who director films such as Alien, Blade Runner, Gladiator and Robin Hood, was born in South Shields.

Ant and Dec

Perhaps the two most ICONIC Geordies on the planet... Ant and Dec! Both boys were born in Newcastle and are loved across the world.

Jade Thirlwall

She's gone on to achieve worldwide success in Little Mix, but Jade Thirlwall was born in South Shields! As well as having a bar in her hometown called Arbeia, Jade is also an Honorary President of South Shields FC.

Perrie Edwards

Jade's Little Mix band mate Perrie Edwards was also born in South Shields! Despite living just miles apart, the girls didn't know each other before they met on The X Factor.

Cheryl

Girls Aloud singer Cheryl lives in London now, but she was born and raised in Walker and Heaton with her family.

Chris Ramsey

Comedian, Strictly star, and creator of the Sh---ed Married Annoyed podcast Chris Ramsey was born in South Shields, as well as his wife Rosie.

Jamie Bell

Actor Jamie Bell, who got his break when he played the lead role in Billy Elliot, was born in Billingham.

Kevin Whately

Actor Kevin Whately, best known for starring in Inspector Morse, was born in Wallsend.

Gem Archer

Gem Archer, who has been in bands such as Oasis, Beady Eye and Noel Gallagher's High Flying Birds, was born in Durham.
